thread.title: Paramount Pictures Sets Sail with New ‘Jason & the Argonauts’ Film
thread.title_full: Paramount Pictures Sets Sail with New ‘Jason & the Argonauts’ Film

author: Meagan Damore
title: Paramount Pictures Sets Sail with New ‘Jason & the Argonauts’ Film
text:
Paramount Pictures Sets Sail with New ‘Jason & the Argonauts’ Film Thursday, October 22nd, 2015 at 4:55pm PST Tweet 
According to TrackingBoard , Paramount Pictures is currently developing a new version of “Jason and the Argonauts” based on the Greek legend of the same name. 
In the myth, Jason and his crew go on quest to find the Golden Fleece, which will win him his tyrannical uncle’s throne in Iolcus. He and his men embark on a dangerous journey aboard his ship, the Argo, encountering gods, monsters, and the hydra as the trip progresses. “Jason and the Argonauts” was also in adapted as a film starring Todd Armstrong and Nancy Kovack in 1963. 
“Elementary” and “Alias” scribe Christopher Hollier will pen the script with Susan Landau producing. Nathan Samdahl and Ashley Brucks will oversee for Paramount. The report adds that concept art and VFX presentations are already being put together in order to speed up the process of finding a director.
